text:
Tompkinsville, Staten Island: Shown is a view of Pavilion Hill, looking southeastward from No. 389 Westervelt Avenue. The view is across Sherman Avenue, Corson Avenue, and Victory Boulevard, the latter running at the foot of the hill. On the left is the Upper New York Bay.

About November 1, 1926

P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond:] Staten Island - Tompkinsville - [Pavilion Hill].
